title: Fontographer Mac OS X Icon
content:
Not to be outdone, one of the first things I wanted to do was create a nice smooth FOG icon for my new OS X machine. . .   
   
So, I am uploading it to share with y'all!   
   
 [http://www.fontschool.com/fog\_icon.sit](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023142210/http:/www.fontschool.com/fog_icon.sit)   
   
Enjoy!   
Stuart :D
author: Diner

comments.content:
Nice job, Stuart! For those without access to OS X, here's Stuart's icon at full size (with the original on the left):   
   
 ![icons](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023142210im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/8344.gif)   
   
Too bad FOG doesn't run native in OS X, but I suppose this is better than nothing. :-)

Well, I suppose I could take a copyright out on it, but I'd rather share it with my font making pals using FOG in OS X.
